summary: Former AATIP director - public UAP disclosure advocate, To The Stars Academy
key_facts: Director of AATIP (Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program) at Pentagon
To The Stars Academy founding member with Tom DeLonge
Released declassified UAP videos (Gimbal, GoFast, Tic Tac)
2023 testified before Congress on UAP crash retrieval programs
concealment: Active classification battles over UAP program details and evidence
